name: Hearful
0:
”Alexa, ask Hearful what are my biggest product risks?”
”Alexa, ask Hearful how do I improve sentiment?”
”Alexa, ask Hearful what are my most talked about items?”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: hear full
Developer Terms of Use
des: The Hearful Alexa skill analyzes customer feedback on products using proprietary models and algorithms. The algorithms compile and process data dynamically to provide you with the most relevant feedback for your business.
